significado: A set of keys used to operate a typewriter, computer, etc.
A component of many instruments including the piano, organ, and harpsichord consisting of usually black and white keys that cause different tones to be produced when struck.
A device with keys of a musical keyboard, used to control electronic sound-producing devices which may be built into or separate from the keyboard device.
To type on a computer keyboard.
verbo.exemplo: “Keyboarding is the part of this job I hate the most.”

significado: A set of written or printed pages, usually bound with a protective cover.
A written work or composition that has been published (printed on pages bound together).
To arrange for someone to have a seat on a plane, a room in a hotel, etc.
verbo.exemplo: “I need to book a flight to New York.”

significado: The star around which the Earth orbits.
The light or warmth received from the earth's sun.
To sit or lie in the sun, especially to tan.
verbo.exemplo: “She likes to sun herself on the beach.”

significado: A woody perennial plant, typically having a single stem or trunk and bearing lateral branches.
To force someone or something up a tree.
verbo.exemplo: “The dog treed the cat.”

significado: A large natural stream of water flowing in a channel to the sea, a lake, or another such stream.
A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level.
A road vehicle, typically with four wheels, powered by an internal combustion engine or electric motor.
A very large expanse of sea.
A large area covered chiefly with trees and undergrowth.
A large town.
A building for human habitation, especially one that is lived in by a family or small group of people.
To provide space for; contain or accommodate.
verbo.exemplo: “The library houses a collection of rare books.”

significado: A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout, an acute sense of smell, non-retractable claws, and a barking, howling, or whining voice.
To follow (someone or their movements) closely and persistently.
verbo.exemplo: “Photographers seemed to dog her every step.”

significado: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractile claws. It is widely kept as a pet or for catching mice.
A warm-blooded egg-laying vertebrate animal distinguished by the possession of feathers, wings, a beak, and (typically) by being able to fly.
An electronic device for storing and processing data, typically in binary form, according to instructions given to it in a variable program.
A system that uses wires and radio signals to send sounds (such as people's voices) over long distances.
To call someone on the telephone.
verbo.exemplo: “She phoned her friend to tell her the news.”

significado: A set of written or printed pages, usually bound with a protective cover.
A written work or composition that has been published (printed on pages bound together).
To arrange for someone to have a seat on a plane, a room in a hotel, etc.
verbo.exemplo: “I need to book a flight to New York.”

significado: A piece of furniture with a flat or sloped surface and typically with drawers, at which one can read, write, or do other work.
An instrument for writing or drawing with ink.
To write or compose.
verbo.exemplo: “She penned a letter to her friend.”

significado: A container, typically made of glass or plastic and with a narrow neck, used for storing drinks or other liquids.
To put (a liquid) into bottles.
verbo.exemplo: “The wine is bottled at the vineyard.”

significado: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, providing a level surface on which objects may be placed.
To postpone consideration of.
verbo.exemplo: “The proposal was tabled for discussion at a later date.”

significado: A separate seat for one person, typically with a back and four legs.
To act as the chairperson of or preside over (an organization, meeting, or public event).
verbo.exemplo: “She chaired the meeting successfully.”

significado: An opening in the wall or roof of a building or vehicle that is fitted with glass or other transparent material in a frame to admit light or air and allow people to see out.
A hinged, sliding, or revolving barrier at the entrance to a building, room, or vehicle, or in the framework of a cupboard.
A piece of ground, often near a house, used for growing flowers, fruit, or vegetables.
To take care of or work in a garden.
verbo.exemplo: “She enjoys gardening on weekends.”

significado: A wide way leading from one place to another, especially one with a specially prepared surface which vehicles can use.
A structure carrying a road, path, railway, etc. across a river, road, or other obstacle.
To make (a difference between two groups) smaller or less significant.
verbo.exemplo: “Efforts are being made to bridge the gap between the rich and poor.”

significado: An institution for educating children.
To educate or train (someone, especially a child).
verbo.exemplo: “She was schooled in France.”

significado: The perceptible natural movement of the air, especially in the form of a current of air blowing from a particular direction.
To move in or take a twisting or spiral course.
verbo.exemplo: “The river winds through the valley.”

significado: The planet on which we live; the world.
The natural satellite of the Earth, visible (chiefly at night) by reflected light from the sun.
To behave or move in a listless and aimless manner.
verbo.exemplo: “She was mooning around the house all day.”

significado: A fixed luminous point in the night sky which is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.
To feature or play a leading role in a film, play, etc.
verbo.exemplo: “She starred in the new movie.”

significado: A celestial body moving in an elliptical orbit around a star.
The solid mineral material forming part of the surface of the earth and other similar planets, exposed on the surface or underlying the soil or oceans.
To move gently to and fro or from side to side.
verbo.exemplo: “She rocked the baby to sleep.”

significado: A loose granular substance, typically pale yellowish brown, resulting from the erosion of siliceous and other rocks and forming a major constituent of beaches, riverbeds, the seabed, and deserts.
To smooth or polish with sandpaper or a mechanical sander.
verbo.exemplo: “He sanded the wooden floor.”

significado: A mountain or hill, typically conical, having a crater or vent through which lava, rock fragments, hot vapor, and gas are or have been erupted from the earth's crust.
A piece of land surrounded by water.
A long body of water curling into an arched form and breaking on the shore.
To move one's hand to and fro in greeting or as a signal.
verbo.exemplo: “She waved to her friend across the street.”

significado: The seed-bearing part of a plant, consisting of reproductive organs (stamens and carpels) that are typically surrounded by a brightly colored corolla (petals) and a green calyx (sepals).
To bloom or come into flower.
verbo.exemplo: “The plant flowers in early spring.”

significado: Vegetation consisting of typically short plants with long, narrow leaves, growing wild or cultivated on lawns and pasture, and as a fodder crop.
To cover with grass.
verbo.exemplo: “The field was grassed over.”

significado: Moisture condensed from the atmosphere that falls visibly in separate drops.
To fall as rain.
verbo.exemplo: “It began to rain heavily.”

significado: A visible mass of condensed watery vapor floating in the atmosphere, typically high above the ground.
To make or become less clear or transparent.
verbo.exemplo: “Her eyes clouded with tears.”

significado: Atmospheric water vapor frozen into ice crystals and falling in light white flakes or lying on the ground as a white layer.
To fall as snow.
verbo.exemplo: “It began to snow heavily.”

significado: Frozen water, a brittle, transparent crystalline solid.
To cover with or change into ice.
verbo.exemplo: “The windshield was iced over.”

significado: The region of the atmosphere and outer space seen from the earth.
To hit or throw (something) high up into the air.
verbo.exemplo: “He skied the ball over the fence.”

significado: A fixed luminous point in the night sky which is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.
To feature or play a leading role in a film, play, etc.
